content: पर्यंकः {@--1@} A bed, couch, sofa. {@--2@} A palanquin. {@--3@} A cloth girt round the back, loins, and kness (by a person) when sitting on his hams; <ab>cf.</ab> अवसक्थिका. {@--4@} A particular kind of posture practised by ascetics in meditation, sitting on the hams; it is the same as वीरासन which is thus defined by Vasiṣṭha:-- एकं पादमथैकस्मिन् विन्यस्योरौ तु संस्थितं . इतरस्मिंस्वथैवोरुं वीरासनमुद हृतं ..; पर्यंकग्रंथिबंध &c. <ls>Mk. 1. 1.</ls>
